description:
Ramos` Gogoat was the third and final Pok√©mon revealed in the gym match against Ash Ketchum where it faced off against Ash`s Frogadier in the last match up of the battle.
Despite using a lot of healing moves, it proved to be an ineffective battle strategy against Ash`s Frogadier as Ash Ketchum observed calmly and carefully and a well timed Water Pulse was able to defeat Ramos` Gogoat.
Ramos rides around his ranch on Gogoat. When Team Rocket was in the area, Ramos` Gogoat was used to stop their mecha.
name: Gogoat (Fukuji)
